answers.answer: Yes, your blood volume is increasing and will nearly double so you may notice you feel your pulse all over now.
Thank you!! I wasn't sure if it was normal. . I'm a ftm
Lol. I feel it too. I swear I can hear my heart beating in a loud public place. So weird what our bodies do.
I feel it too! Sometimes I doubt I'll be able to notice my baby's first flutters since I'll probably be mistaking it with my pulse lol
Great question! I always wanted to know that

It's s oooooo irritating!!!!! Lol I feel like every heartbeat, I can feel throughout my body. Not sure why... my blood pressure is good, I don't have gestational diabetes,  and it isn't always, but man it can suck. Sorry you're going through it too. Good luck.
I feel like my heart is going to jump out sometimes at first it scared me but now I am understanding all that is going on in my body
Hi allEven i feel that some time my heart beat got increased and it sacreed my many time....Is that normal???

question: Is it normal to feel your pulse everywhere? ? My head, arms, ears, belly. . I'm only 15w 5d..
title: felling my pulse threw my whole body
